name: The Path Of Creation
description:
Description:

The Path Of Creation is an intense puzzle and 3D platforms game of minimalist style, with a personal story. Enter this abstract world to overcome its challenges and try to unravel its secrets. Make use of the destruction and physics of this surreal world to open your own path.

Features:
  • Destroy certain parts of the map in your favor to overcome each level in different ways.
  • A clean and unique minimalist style.
  • Try to unravel this little personal story.
  • Discover its true ending.
